item.description: [[ReadItLater]] [[Article]] Emoji cheat sheet for GitHub, Basecamp and other services However some of the emoji codes are not super easy to remember, so here is a little cheat sheet. âœˆ Got a modern browser or Flash enabled? Click the emoji code and it will be copied to your clipboard. This resource is maintained for free by WebFX. If you have any feature suggestions or issues with the page, please submit them here for our team to review.

[[ReadItLater]] [[Article]] How I Read Research Papers with Obsidian and Zotero 19 August 2021 | 6 min read | Read more about Learning How do we manage the complexity and depth from research papers in our note systems? How do we minimize the friction of taking notes in a PDF document and turning those into evergreen, permanent notes? Those were the exact questions I was asking myself a few days ago.
[[ReadItLater]] [[Youtube]] Zettelkasten Smart Notes: Step by Step with Obsidian - YouTube
